name: LL024 SNIPPETS - Dan Ellis - E330 EP (w/ Ben Pest remix)
text: Loose Lips are delighted to present our labels 24th expedition, E330 EP - a colourful blend of melody, mystery and madness from Merseyside-raised producer, @danellismusic. A rubbery 6-track audial adventure, complementing LLs lifelong love for all things braindance.The release includes 5 originals spanning killer breaks, jubilant IDM, gasping ambience, hyperpop-impacted electronica and maundering acidâ€¦then accompanied by 1 fierce technoid remix from a LL firm favourite and raucous music maker, @benpest .

name: Loose Lips w/ Cooper T 02-12-21 (Reform Radio)
text: Treece hosts this evenings show, with a round up of his favourite releases of the year. Then local duo Cooper T join us in the studio for a chat.
